entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullability analysis could be improved after ReferenceEquals checks #59157
  • VS2019 and VS2022 Roslyn / SDK incompatible #59156
  • CS8604 when checking 'is not null'. No error when checking '!= null' #59152

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior with dynamic and void returning functions #59132

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue link #59158
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Revert "Update StreamJsonRpc" #59154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update publish data for 17.1 #59153
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main #59150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59155
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions" #59148
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59151
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update prerelease version for 17.1 Preview 5 #59127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59162
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59161
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • [Draft] Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE
